job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtwork with industry experts in combining the best of deep learning and semiconductor design to bring onedge machine learning to listening devicesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtthis will improve efficiency and improving privacy whilst lowering latency and saving bandwidth moving away from inference and training that is dependent on cloud or legacy datacenters this company uses unique technology to accelerate toward processing on deviceampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtas the first implementation is on devices with listening capabilities the company is looking for a strong engineer with the ability to implement speech and audio algorithms in high quality seamless codeampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtif youre a passionate innovative engineer excited about the future of deep learning then this is for youampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtto be considered youll needltpgtltulgtltligtphd in a relevant technical fieldltligtltligt years as a strong technical contributor in speech andor audio processingltligtltligta strong list of patents and publicationsltligtltligtexperience with dsp implementation and optimization of speech and audio algorithmsltligtltligtexperience with acoustic testing of speech and audio algorithmsdevicesltligtltligtexperience with machine learning deep learning audio processing speech processing speech recognition multimicrophone spatial processing acoustics echo cancellation singlechannel noise suppression acoustic testing source separation singlechannel noise suppression dereverberationltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltemgtbig cloud is acting as a vendor to this position which is a direct hireltemgtltpgt
